Monster Rancher DS Pre-Order?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2010 Topics (Year of the Shock Rock): Monster Rancher DS Pre-Order?
By Penguin God on Monday, January 18, 2010 - 07:19 am:

Does anyone know of a place taking pre-orders on this title? I really want to show my support for the franchise, but the only places I see it popping up on are a couple non-descript sites that I don't exactly trust.

By Lisa Shock on Monday, January 18, 2010 - 07:37 am:

Gamestop doesn't have it in their computer yet. If it's possible for you to drop by one of their stores (GameStop, Babbage's, Software Etc., E.B. Games, Electronics Boutique) please talk to the staff and ask about the game. They are supposed to file a report, they have the ability to do it daily, to let the buyers know what people are asking about. If you ask, hopefully, word will get to the higher-ups.

By Rahu on Thursday, January 28, 2010 - 12:20 pm:

By Rahu on Thursday, January 28, 2010 - 02:48 pm:

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, January 28, 2010 - 04:59 pm:

Amazon's game fulfillment is via Toys R Us's outdated trucking system and quite plainly stinks. The games get shipped from the factory to the TRU warehouse in New Jersey. They then get loaded onto semi-trucks and head to various stores and Amazon's warehouse in the Northwest. They arrive at least 6 days later, then get processed and shelved.

Now, if you buy from an Amazon Marketplace seller, that's a whole different story. Know the difference.
